    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1017</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Unicef / Volunteering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unicef/Freiwillig erbieten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'UNICEF/Offrir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">UNICEF/Oferecer-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unicef/Offrirsi volontariamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">UNICEF/na προσφερθεί εθελοντικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Unicef/El Ofrecerse voluntariamente</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For student- guidelines on how to write a project from beginning to end. For teacher: how to assess student's project. Topic - UNICEF volunteers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Unicef</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Volunteers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interview</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">project guidlines</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für Kursteilnehmerrichtlinien über, wie man ein 
Projekt von Anfang bis Ende schreibt. Für Lehrer: wie man
Projekt des Kursteilnehmers festsetzt. Thema - UNICEF 
Freiwilliger.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour des directives d'étudiant sur la façon dont
écrire un projet du commencement jusqu'à la fin. Pour le 
professeur : comment évaluer le projet de l'étudiant. 
Sujet - volontaires de l'UNICEF.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para guidelines do estudante em como escrever um 
projeto do começo à extremidade. Para o professor: como 
avaliar o projeto do estudante. Tópico - voluntários da 
UNICEF.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la guida di riferimento dell'allievo su come 
scrivere un progetto dall'inizio alla fine. Per l'insegnante: 
come valutare progetto dell'allievo. Soggetto - volontari 
del UNICEF.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για το σπουδαστή - οδηγίες για το πώς να γράψει ένα 
πρόγραμμα από την αρχή να τελειώνει. Για το δάσκαλο: 
πώς να αξιολογήσει το πρόγραμμα του σπουδαστή. Θέμα -
εθελοντές UNICEF.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para las guías de consulta del estudiante en 
cómo escribir un proyecto de comenzar al extremo. Para el 
profesor: cómo evaluar el proyecto del estudiante. Asunto
- voluntarios de la Unicef.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unicef</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erbietet sich freiwillig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interview</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt guidlines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'UNICEF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Offre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
